entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
